subject: 3066546554963523 Hexagon Shifter Problem
description_text:
Hi,  
  
  Please watch the video and let me know what's wrong with this shifter is. 

  
  
  
  
  I got it within today and tested out after mounting. 
  
  Even on usb game controller I could not use 1st, 2nd and 6th. I don't 
want do it with whole craft to avoid any damage. 
  
  
  
  
  
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w8QkWNRfgZ4_DEF9b-9bSJewnH0CNjhX/view?usp=drivesdk 
  
  
  
  
  
Awaiting your soonest reply to this. 
  
  
  
  
  Greets from Germany  
  
  
  
  
  Emre Cillioglu

conversations.body_text: Hi Emre Cillioglu,  Could you please remove the six screws around the base, take off the handle, and open the product to take photos of the internal top and bottom structure for verification? We need to determine whether it is a loose screw or a product defect.

It looks like that the black frame for shifter has been mounted wrong way. 
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Kj1BmqLMWX_ygSMYYtt0O6zc-3L2n9Vp/view?usp=drivesdk 
  
  
  
  
  
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QZTAtBTYv9u0mHd3F84z_7m4ieBPe8ye/view?usp=drivesdk
